page.description: RETURN causes an unconditional exit from a user-defined function.

section.title: Example
section.description: This function will be terminated if the second argument is 0.
section.example: function divide as N(arg1 as N, arg2 as N) if arg2 = 0 then ui_msg_box("Error","Cannot divide by zero") return end if divide = arg1/arg2 end function
